tha-ap527:0.3_0: Hearing this, sometimes the senior monks,
tha-ap527:1.2_0: He has crossed over the world.
tha-ap527:1.4_0: He rejoices in heaven for an eon.
tha-ap527:2.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
tha-ap527:2.4_0: That is the fruit of a dream.
tha-ap527:3.1_0: My defilements have been burnt away by practicing absorption—
tha-ap527:5.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
tha-ap527:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Suppiyā.
tha-ap527:7.1_0: The fifth Kappina of the senior monks have been placed in the fifth.
